Name: Dodge Mania
About the game: Dodge Mania is a simple game made by Unity. You will control different charracters in different levels and your goal is to dodge objects falling to you. This game will test your reactions , dodging ability and quick thinking. while first two levels are just about dodging nexrt levels have mechanics such as collecting potions or flying enemy chasing you.
